column5: Hello, looking for some insight on some ideas for lure/bait types on the gullrock chain. Heading up the 14th of June. The walleyes are usually in shallow river mouths or shallow bays, and in the process of moving into drop offs and structure. In the past i have used just a 1/4 jig head tipped with a minnow, and was wondering if any of you had any ideas or strategies that have worked for you. thanksps. cant wait to get on the lake with a cold labatts in hand.gracias por todoB.Nelson
